text: Milan Todorović (; born 28 February 1983) is a Serbian football midfielder. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Niš Category:Association football midfielders Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Vlasina players Category:FK Radnički Niš players Category:FK Radnički Pirot players Category:FK Sinđelić Niš players Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Serbian expatriates in Albania Category:Expatriate footballers in Albania
title: Milan Todorović (footballer)
